item.title: Contact
item.description: For any queries or feedback, contact us by email, message us on mastodon, file an issue or seek support by visiting us on GitHub and going to the respective package/s you have issues on.

item.title: Explore the nutriverse
item.description: Explore the various tools and tips provided by the nutriverse for nutrition data analysis.

item.title: Nutriverse
item.description: Our mission is to foster a community of nutrition data analysts who use R language for statistical computing. We aim to provide this community with support through the development of robust and performant R packages as tools for their analytical tasks, and learning through day-to-day technical guidance and impactful peer-to-peer learning.
